function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy consumption in municipality buildings during lockdown","Impact":"Increased energy costs and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient measures and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Smart building automation systems, energy-efficient lighting, and HVAC systems","People":"Municipality officials, building managers, and environmental conservationists","Owner":"Municipality officials and building managers"},{"Description":"Unnoticed remaining energy consumption in buildings","Impact":"Increased energy waste and cost","Mitigation":"Implement power management systems and conduct regular energy audits","Technologies":"Power management software, energy monitoring devices, and automated energy control systems","People":"Building managers and energy efficiency professionals","Owner":"Building managers and energy efficiency professionals"},{"Description":"Comparison of energy consumption with Basal Metabolic Rate","Impact":"Increased awareness of energy use intensity and potential inefficiencies","Mitigation":"Implement energy benchmarking and performance tracking","Technologies":"Energy benchmarking software and energy performance tracking tools","People":"Energy analysts, building managers, and energy efficiency professionals","Owner":"Building managers and energy efficiency professionals"}]}
